nodes.text: UTT-90 was a B1-Series battle droid in the service of the company known as the Trade Federation and its Droid Army as a commander. Like all B1 battle droids, UTT-90 had masculine programming, was 1.91 meters tall, and was equipped with an E-5 blaster rifle. He had light tan plating with brown markings, and had a backpack with an antenna.

UTT-90 appeared in the 2001 LucasArts video game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds as a unit that could be placed in the game's scenario editor. The droid has an identical profile image and model to other unique battle droid units. When placed in a scenario, UTT-90's model uses different colors from his profile image, featuring the tan color common to other B1-Series battle droids on his head and parts of his limbs along with the color selected by the player's alignment on his chest and legs. UTT-90's name can also be mentioned as a commander for the Trade Federation AI in the standard game mode.
